title: Hextech Chest Bug? Maybe?
body:
So here's the problem. I have chests available apparently and I have keys. But when I go to the "crafting" section on League of Legends I cannot open any chests, even though it says I have them available and I haven't opened them on any of my champions. Maybe I'm misunderstanding the chest system, but from what I think I understand, I SHOULD be able to open at least one chest...help?

http://imgur.com/5MySOf1
http://imgur.com/BN6oy5B
http://imgur.com/XwXl1eS

replies.body: Chests available means that you can get that amount of chests so on the picture you can get 4 chests!
Thank you! I think I understand now (:

Hey PizzaNarwhal,

Sorry for the confusion. It looks like you're eligible for earning Hextech chests, however you don't currently own any. You're able to earn up to 4 chests per month, which your screenshot shows all 4 are still available. Since you already have keys, once you nab a chest, you'll be able to open it right away. You can find out more about the Hextech crafting system on our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok, thank you (: that makes more sense!
